did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: United Brotherhood of Carpenters and Joiners of America Local 125 (Utica, NY) Records on Microfilm, 1891-1970
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library

bioghist.head: ORGANIZATIONAL HISTORY
bioghist.p: The United Brotherhood of Carpenters and Joiners of America, often referred to as the United Brotherhood of Carpenters was formed in 1881. It has grown to be one of the largest trade unions in the United States, and between its chapters and locals there is international cooperation. Local 3211 is based in Herkimer, New York.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Copies of 66 bound volumes on 3 positive microfilm reels. A negative copy is available upon request.
